<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Deleting invalid Interactive filters in APM dashboards </description>
        <name>Invalid Interactive filters deletion</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_hp_reference');

var sysIds = ["3b0801574f852200720674828110c76d", "573be53393d122002f217a75e57ffb9a", "75fd381f4f452200720674828110c7af", "9e8785174f852200720674828110c7d7", "acab293393d122002f217a75e57ffb9c", "b58721b7939122002f217a75e57ffb69"];
gr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', sysIds);
gr.query();

while (gr.next()) {
    gs.info("Deleting record with sysID: " + gr.sys_id);
    var value = gr.deleteRecord();
    gs.info("Deletion status: " + value);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-02-24 14:24:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>163d81f6eb710110402ba172c15228ee</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Invalid Interactive filters deletion</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Business Planner" source="com.snc.apm.business_planner">3fffcee747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43ce</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_163d81f6eb710110402ba172c15228ee</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-02-24 14:24:57</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
